posts.post_title: T205 +T206 for sale Hof and Rare backs
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Russ Bright
All prices are shipped, insurance is extra - paypal works well - also cash and check/MO


T205s

Bobby Wallace - No cap, 2 lines Polar Bear - Raw, would grade Fair (SGC20/PSA2) some creasing, rounded corners - SOLD
Hans Lobert - Broadleaf Back - SGC10 - $100 

John Evers - Cycle Back - SGC30 - $160 

Fred Beck - Polar Bear - SGC40 - Sold 

Patsy Dougherty - White Sock - Sovereign SGC50 - $200

T206s

John McGraw - hand at side - Red Hindu - POOR!!! - the very poor, but hey it's a HOF and a Red Hindu - Sold

Arch Persons - BROWN Hindu - PSA2 (mk) would grade higher, but there is pencil and grease pen writing on the back - very presentable, still - Sold

Clark Griffith Portrait - SGC40 - Piedmont back - $100
 
Cy Young Portrait - SGC40 - Piedmont Back - $800

Joe Tinker (Bat Off) - SGC40 - Sovereign 350 - $200
 
Johnny Evers Bat, Cubs on shirt - SGC40 - SCap - $250
 
I might have more, I'll keep looking - e-mail for scans or with any questions - ambrosia2@hotmail.com

thanks!
Russ
